backend_llm_notes: Locally hosted Ollama model - gpt-oss:20b (13 GB, based on GPT architecture)
original_prompt: Help me set the agenda to review the progress of Project Alpha with the product and marketing team to get confirmation we are on track and discuss any blocking issues or risks.

gutts.name: Stakeholder Identification
gutts.capability: Identify all participants relevant to the meeting, confirming their roles and responsibilities.
gutts.user_goal: Ensure the agenda includes all necessary participants.
gutts.evidence: Identified product and marketing team as stakeholders.

gutts.name: Agenda Item Generation
gutts.capability: Generate specific agenda topics based on meeting objectives: progress review, confirmation on track, blockers, risks.
gutts.user_goal: Create clear agenda items covering all required discussions.
gutts.evidence: Generated agenda items: 1) Progress Review, 2) Confirmation of On-Track Status, 3) Blocking Issues Discussion, 4) Risk Assessment.

gutts.name: Agenda Structuring
gutts.capability: Arrange agenda items in logical sequence and allocate time slots.
gutts.evidence: Structured agenda: 10 min Progress Review, 5 min Confirmation, 10 min Blocking Issues, 10 min Risks, 5 min Q&A.

gutts.name: Agenda Drafting
gutts.capability: Produce the final agenda document in a readable format.
gutts.evidence: Drafted agenda document ready for distribution.

notes: Generated by Ollama gpt-oss:20b - Locally hosted LLM on macOS
